title: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: The 'Add Javadoc' option is available in the context menu of a field in TH. When this option is selected, nothing happens.
EB: When the 'Add Javadoc' option is selected from the context menu of a field in TH, it should add the Javadoc for the field.
SR:
1. Open TH.
2. Go to a field in the code.
3. Right-click on the field.
4. From the context menu, select 'Add Javadoc'.
5. Observe that the Javadoc is not added.
